channel.title: What game are you looking forward to the most?
channel.description:
So, what game are you guys Eagerly anticipating this year?
For me its a tie between Bioshock Infinite and Halo 4.
Dishonored looks pretty good but I haven't seen any gameplay, so I cant really get excited about it.

item.title: What game are you looking forward to the most?
item.dc:creator: 3dwizzard
item.description:
Carmageddon: Reincarnation should revitalize racing games again when it comes out in february 2013, so I’m looking forward to that.
I’m also looking forward to Doom4.

Read full topic
item.source: What game are you looking forward to the most?

item.title: What game are you looking forward to the most?
item.dc:creator: MDIGN
item.description:
You guys probably never heard of it, but this game/mod called Black Mesa Source, gonna be awesome. Even though the devs are quiet, I know they’re cooking up something good.

…but in all seriousness.
Borderlands 2, Halo 4, Guild Wars 2, and Counter-Strike: GO.
I’m kinda waiting on Darksiders 2, but I got so close to beating the first one and then I lost all my save data and I really don’t feel like doing all of it over again.

Read full topic
item.source: What game are you looking forward to the most?

item.title: What game are you looking forward to the most?
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
After seeing footage of and finding info about it, I’d definitely say Planetside 2 as well. The idea of 2000 players in an all out futuristic war with battlefield-like gameplay, but larger is just hugely appealing to me.

Also the official steam release of Natural Selection 2 (because it will have all the main features by then), Max Payne 3 in a couple of days, and Path of Exile’s next open beta because they will be adding the next Act to the game.

Read full topic
item.source: What game are you looking forward to the most?

item.title: What game are you looking forward to the most?
item.dc:creator: Karriz
item.description:
Planetside 2 mostly at the moment. It just seems like something I’ve always wanted to play.

Read full topic
item.source: What game are you looking forward to the most?

item.title: What game are you looking forward to the most?
item.dc:creator: deadlife101
item.description:
Anyone that says Half-Life 3 can’t really say that, because it isn’t an “upcoming game” because it hasn’t really been announced.

Well anyway I am actually waiting for CS: GO, DOTA 2, Black Ops 2, Dishonored, Halo 4, GTAV, and Asscreed 3, plus the four mods in my sig, and a couple of other mods, like Op4 2 and such.

Read full topic
item.source: What game are you looking forward to the most?

item.title: What game are you looking forward to the most?
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
Maxey:

This is why I wish Bethesda Softworks was known as Zenimax and only Bethesda Game Studios was named like that, to avoid this easy-to-make confusion.

Yeah that annoys me too. So many people giving Bethesda credit for things they don’t deserve credit for and poor devs not getting any at all.

Read full topic

item.title: What game are you looking forward to the most?
item.dc:creator: DiePoente
item.description:
I like Arkane Studios. They are talented and Dark Messiah was really underrated. I’m always open for complete new games and not with the third or fourth sequel of a game.

Read full topic
item.source: What game are you looking forward to the most?

item.title: What game are you looking forward to the most?
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
0_22one:

Dishonored. MOstly because its from Bethesda, and they haven’t ever really disappointed me.

Published by Bethesda Softworks, not made made by Bethesda Game Studios.

Arkane Studios is actually the development team behind it.

This is why I wish Bethesda Softworks was known as Zenimax and only Bethesda Game Studios was named like that, to avoid this easy-to-make confusion.

Read full topic
item.source: What game are you looking forward to the most?

item.title: What game are you looking forward to the most?
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
That’s far from every upcoming game. Also, looking forward to =/= favorite.

All games on that list may very well be disappointing. Except Max Payne 3, which I already have pre-ordered.

item.title: What game are you looking forward to the most?
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
Bioshock Infinite got delayed to next year btw.

Anyway I am looking forward to GTA 5 if it comes out this year. Also Assassin’s Creed II and Borderlands 2 the most.

item.title: What game are you looking forward to the most?
item.dc:creator: TheeGoatPig
item.description:
Planetside was the first and only MMO that I was ever really interested in. Planetside 2 is the new exception. I never had so much fun with an online game as I did with Planetside.

Read full topic
item.source: What game are you looking forward to the most?

item.title: What game are you looking forward to the most?
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
Halo 4. I’m really into the new style 343 is going for. Hoping it’ll be the best Halo yet, and I feel like that is very probable what with their intent to make it less of a hallway shooter and more like something that will require exploration. The production values on every aspect looks boundless.

Read full topic
